name: Home for Jack
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2019

"Home for Jack" is an ASCII-based platformer adventure about the troubles of leaving home for the first time to live by yourself. Follow Jack as he tries to understand the situation he is now in and figures out what exactly home is...

It is recommended to use Chrome, other browsers haven't been tested.

While it says to use arrow keys and space in the tutorial, you can also use WASD keys and any gamepad controller.
